message:
Damn no comments rlly?
its a pretty good movie ngl

The 5 OVA and the this movie is way better than the later 2 seasons. This has a more matured story telling. The 2005-6 reboot was kinda ridiculous (and a lil bit cringy as well) and the pacing was really slow, that's why at some point the series got kinda boring.
